lines.text: Don't know what I hate more, tea without sugar or a fat paunch.
It's the only thing I hate about this job - ringing strange doorbells and bringing bad news.
She's a no good tramp, that's what I told her. That's what I told you. Whatever she's done, she deserves what she's got.
I know something's going on - you've got police cars running round town like someone's stolen the Chief Constable's golf clubs.
